entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
